verses.verse: When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had spoken <S%G2036><s%> these words, <S%G5023><s%> he went out <S%G1831><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> over <S%G4008><s%> the brook <S%G5493><s%> Kidron, <S%G2748><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a garden, <S%G2779><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> entered. <S%G1525><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> Judas, <S%G2455><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> betrayed <S%G3860><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> the place, <S%G5117><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> often <S%G4178><s%> met <S%G4863><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

Judas <S%G2455><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> having taken <S%G2983><s%> a detachment <S%G4686><s%> of soldiers and <S%G2532><s%> officers <S%G5257><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> lanterns, <S%G5322><s%> <S%G2532><s%> torches, <S%G2985><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> weapons. <S%G3696><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> all the things <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> were happening <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> went forth, <S%G1831><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> are you looking for? <S%G2212><s%>"

They answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth. <S%G3480><s%>" Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he. <S%G1161><s%>" Judas <S%G2455><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> betrayed <S%G3860><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> was standing <S%G2476><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

When <S%G5613><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G3754><s%> "I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he, <S%G565><s%>" they went <S%G1519><s%> backward, <S%G3694><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> to the ground. <S%G5476><s%>

Again <S%G3825><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> he <S%G1905><s%> asked them, <S%G846><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> are you <S%G2212><s%> looking for? <S%G1161><s%>" They said, <S%G2036><s%> "Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth. <S%G3480><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "I told <S%G2036><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he. <S%G1487><s%> If therefore <S%G3767><s%> you seek <S%G2212><s%> me, <S%G1691><s%> let <S%G863><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> go their way, <S%G5217><s%>"

that <S%G2443><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he spoke, <S%G3754><s%> "Of <S%G1537><s%> those <S%G846><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you have given <S%G1325><s%> me, <S%G3427><s%> I have lost <S%G622><s%> <S%G3756><s%> none. <S%G3762><s%>"

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> a sword, <S%G3162><s%> drew <S%G1670><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> struck <S%G3817><s%> the high priest <S%G749><s%>'s servant, <S%G1401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cut off <S%G609><s%> his <S%G846><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> ear. <S%G1161><s%> The servant <S%G1401><s%>'s name <S%G3686><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> Malchus. <S%G3124><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to Peter, <S%G4074><s%> "Put <S%G906><s%> the <S%G4675><s%> sword <S%G3162><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> its sheath. <S%G2336><s%> The cup <S%G4221><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> me, <S%G3427><s%> shall I <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> surely drink <S%G4095><s%> it? <S%G846><s%>"

So <S%G3767><s%> the detachment, <S%G4686><s%> the <S%G2532><s%> commanding officer, <S%G5506><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the officers <S%G5257><s%> of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> seized <S%G4815><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> him, <S%G846><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> led <S%G520><s%> him <S%G846><s%> <S%G99999><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Annas <S%G452><s%> first, <S%G4412><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> father-in <S%G3995><s%>-law to Caiaphas, <S%G2533><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> high priest <S%G749><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> year. <S%G1763><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> advised <S%G4823><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was expedient that <S%G4851><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> man <S%G444><s%> should perish <S%G622><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> the people. <S%G2992><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> as <S%G2532><s%> did another <S%G243><s%> disciple. <S%G3101><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> to the high priest, <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> entered in with <S%G4897><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the court <S%G833><s%> of the high priest; <S%G749><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> was standing <S%G2476><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> outside. <S%G1854><s%> So <S%G3767><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other <S%G243><s%> disciple, <S%G3101><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> to the high priest, <S%G749><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spoke <S%G2036><s%> to her who kept the door, <S%G2377><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> brought in <S%G1521><s%> Peter. <S%G4074><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> the maid <S%G3814><s%> who <S%G1565><s%> kept the door <S%G2377><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Peter, <S%G4074><s%> "Are <S%G1488><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> one of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> man <S%G444><s%>'s disciples? <S%G3101><s%>" He said, <S%G3004><s%> "I am <S%G1510><s%> not. <S%G3756><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the officers <S%G5257><s%> were standing there, <S%G2476><s%> having made <S%G4160><s%> a fire of coals, <S%G439><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> cold. <S%G5592><s%> They <S%G2532><s%> were warming themselves. <S%G2328><s%> <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> <S%G2258><s%> was with <S%G3326><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> warming himself. <S%G2328><s%>

The high priest <S%G749><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> asked <S%G2065><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> teaching. <S%G1322><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "I <S%G1473><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> openly <S%G3954><s%> to the world. <S%G2889><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple, <S%G2411><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> meet. <S%G4905><s%> <S%G2532><s%> I said <S%G2980><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> secret. <S%G2927><s%>

Why <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G1905><s%> ask me? <S%G3165><s%> Ask <S%G1905><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> have heard me <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> I said <S%G2980><s%> to them. <S%G846><s%> Behold, <S%G1492><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> the things <S%G3739><s%> which I <S%G1473><s%> said. <S%G2036><s%>"

When <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> had <S%G2036><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> this, <S%G5023><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the officers <S%G5257><s%> standing by <S%G3936><s%> slapped <S%G1325><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> with his hand, <S%G4475><s%> saying, <S%G2036><s%> "Do you <S%G611><s%> answer the high priest <S%G749><s%> like that? <S%G3779><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> I have spoken <S%G2980><s%> evil, <S%G2560><s%> testify <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the evil; <S%G2556><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> well, <S%G2573><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G1194><s%> beat me? <S%G3165><s%>"
Annas <S%G452><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> him <S%G846><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Caiaphas, <S%G2533><s%> the high priest. <S%G749><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> warming himself. <S%G2328><s%> They said <S%G2036><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "You <S%G4771><s%> aren't <S%G1488><s%> <S%G3361><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> one of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> are you? <S%G1565><s%>" He denied <S%G720><s%> it, <S%G2532><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> "I am <S%G1510><s%> not. <S%G3756><s%>"

One <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of the high priest, <S%G749><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> a relative <S%G4773><s%> of him whose <S%G3739><s%> ear <S%G5621><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> had cut off, <S%G609><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Didn't <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the garden <S%G2779><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him? <S%G846><s%>"
Peter <S%G4074><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> denied <S%G720><s%> it again, <S%G3825><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> the rooster <S%G220><s%> crowed. <S%G5455><s%>

They <S%G71><s%> led Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the Praetorium. <S%G4232><s%> It <S%G1161><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> early, <S%G4405><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G1525><s%> themselves <S%G846><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the Praetorium, <S%G4232><s%> that they might <S%G2443><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> be defiled, <S%G3392><s%> but <S%G235><s%> might <S%G2443><s%> eat <S%G5315><s%> the Passover. <S%G3957><s%>

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> accusation <S%G2724><s%> do you <S%G5342><s%> bring against <S%G2596><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> man? <S%G444><s%>"

They answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> this man <S%G3778><s%> weren't <S%G2258><s%> <S%G3361><s%> an evildoer, <S%G2555><s%> we wouldn't <S%G3860><s%> <S%G3756><s%> have <S%G302><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> up to you. <S%G4671><s%>"

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Take <S%G2983><s%> him <S%G846><s%> yourselves, <S%G5210><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> him <S%G846><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> law. <S%G3551><s%>" Therefore <S%G3767><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> said to <S%G2036><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "It is <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lawful for us <S%G2254><s%> to put <S%G615><s%> anyone <S%G3762><s%> to death, <S%G615><s%>"

that <S%G2443><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he spoke, <S%G2036><s%> signifying <S%G4591><s%> by what <S%G4169><s%> kind of death <S%G2288><s%> he should <S%G3195><s%> die. <S%G599><s%>

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the Praetorium, <S%G4232><s%> <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G5455><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Are <S%G1488><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> the King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews? <S%G2453><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Do you <S%G4771><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> by <S%G575><s%> yourself, <S%G1438><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> did others <S%G243><s%> tell <S%G2036><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> me? <S%G1700><s%>"

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> answered, <S%G3385><s%> "I <S%G2453><s%>'m not a Jew, am <S%G1510><s%> I? <S%G1473><s%> Your own <S%G4674><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> to me. <S%G1698><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> have you done? <S%G4160><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "My <S%G1699><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> world. <S%G2889><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> then my <S%G1698><s%> servants <S%G5257><s%> would <S%G302><s%> fight, <S%G75><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I wouldn't <S%G3860><s%> <S%G3361><s%> be delivered <S%G3860><s%> to the Jews. <S%G2453><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> from here. <S%G1782><s%>"

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Are <S%G1488><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> a king <S%G935><s%> then? <S%G3766><s%>" Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "You <S%G4771><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> a king. <S%G935><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> this reason <S%G5124><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> have been <S%G1080><s%> born, <S%G1080><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> this reason <S%G5124><s%> I <S%G2064><s%> have come into <S%G1519><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I should testify <S%G3140><s%> to the truth. <S%G225><s%> Everyone <S%G3956><s%> who is <S%G5607><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> listens <S%G191><s%> to my <S%G3450><s%> voice. <S%G5456><s%>"

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> truth? <S%G225><s%>" When he had said <S%G2036><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> he went out <S%G1831><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "I <S%G1473><s%> find <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> basis for a charge <S%G156><s%> against <S%G1722><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> you have <S%G2076><s%> a custom, <S%G4914><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I should release <S%G630><s%> someone <S%G1520><s%> to <S%G5213><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the Passover. <S%G3957><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> do you <S%G1014><s%> want me to release <S%G630><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> the King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews? <S%G2453><s%>"

Then <S%G3767><s%> they <S%G2905><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> shouted again, <S%G3825><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Not <S%G3361><s%> this man, <S%G5126><s%> but <S%G235><s%> Barabbas! <S%G912><s%>" Now <S%G1161><s%> Barabbas <S%G912><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> a robber. <S%G3027><s%>
